thread.title: This Is What Various Bollywood Celebrities Put Out As Their Very First Instagram Posts
thread.title_full: This Is What Various Bollywood Celebrities Put Out As Their Very First Instagram Posts

title: This Is What Various Bollywood Celebrities Put Out As Their Very First Instagram Posts
text:
facebook 
Thanks to social profiles, we can constantly be updated about B-townies and what they are up to in their real lives. As we stalk them on Instagram (not creepily, of course) we thought of looking at their first ever Instagram post. What did we find on this archaeological digging spree? Surprising posts. Some celebrities had amazing debut images, while some went on completely random routes. Check out the list below. 
Shah Rukh Khan has just 132 posts on Instagram. The selfie below is what he had as his first Instagram post and we aren't surprised it's a brooding one! 
Sunny Leone posted a selfie along with hubby as she started her Instagram account. 
Amitabh Bachchan was all smiles as he was being clicked at Saputara. 
That's what Anushka Sharma posted as her first ever Instagram pic. Nice nail polish! 
Deepika Padukone had this video as her first Insta post. A video posted by Deepika Padukone (@deepikapadukone) on Sep 25, 2013 at 9:49am PDT 
Sidharth Malhotra lost his Instagram virginity with this selfie. 
Would you believe Abhishek Bachchan has Krushna Abhishek's picture as his first Insta post? This is from the time when they were shooting for the movie Bol Bachchan . 
Jacqueline Fernandez made her Insta debut with this gorgeous image. 
Hottie Ranveer Singh shared a thank you video as his first post on Instagram after completing four years in the industry. A video posted by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) on Dec 9, 2014 at 9:52pm PST 
This grainy but sexy black and white image, was Arjun Kapoor's first picture on his Instagram profile. 
Priyanka Chopra chose to share a selfie with her friend as her debut Insta post. Photo Credit: Instagram
